ComicInfo.Title: Demon in the Pines; The Loveland Frogman Never Did Anything for Me
ComicInfo.Summary:
What lurks in the dark recesses of the Pacific Northwest? Bryce Ingman (the Ringo-nominated My Bad) brings us the Loveland Frogman, who is ready and willing to help when he can. Paul Constant (Snelson, Planet of the Nerds) brings us the Gumerboo, who is willing to help in a very different kind of way.
Both stories are beautifully illustrated by Peter Krause (also My Bad).
